lead_paragraph: Washington law authorities are investigating whether Wizards guard Gilbert Arenas presented a gun during a locker room argument.
snippet: Washington law authorities are investigating whether Wizards guard Gilbert Arenas presented a gun during a locker room argument.

headline.main: Wizards Gun Inquiry Focuses on Dispute
